<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Pinch Time](/Feats.aspx?ID=1445) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Half-Elf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=85" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 47 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

One of your parents has a human life span and another an elven life span, with your own somewhere between. As a result, you have an unusual perspective on time, which you've learned to manifest to aid yourself in moments of stress. You gain [_haste_](/Spells.aspx?ID=147) as a 3rd-level arcane innate spell, though you can target only yourself. You can Cast this Spell once per day.
name: Pinch Time
